problem_names:
theorem ComSecTyping_single_is_sound:
"\<lbrakk> \<turnstile>\<^bsub>\<C>\<^esub> c; unique_PPc c \<rbrakk>
  \<Longrightarrow> WHATWHERE_Secure [c]"

theorem ComSecTyping_list_is_sound:
"\<lbrakk> \<turnstile>\<^bsub>\<V>\<^esub> V; unique_PPV V \<rbrakk> \<Longrightarrow> WHATWHERE_Secure V"
translations:
theorem ComSecTyping_single_is_sound:
"\<lbrakk> \<turnstile>\<^bsub>\<C>\<^esub> c; unique_PPc c \<rbrakk>
  \<Longrightarrow> WHATWHERE_Secure [c]"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<lbrakk>\<turnstile>\<^bsub>\<C>\<^esub> c; unique_PPc c\<rbrakk>
    \<Longrightarrow> WHATWHERE_Secure [c]

proof (induct rule: ComSecTyping_ComSecTypingL.inducts(1)
    [of _ _ "auxiliary_predicate"], simp_all add: auxiliary_predicate_def)
fix \<iota>
show "WHATWHERE_Secure [skip\<^bsub>\<iota>\<^esub>]"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. WHATWHERE_Secure [skip\<^bsub>\<iota>\<^esub>]
by (metis WHATWHERE_Secure_Skip)
next
fix x e \<iota>
assume "AssignSideCondition x e \<iota>"
thus "WHATWHERE_Secure [x :=\<^bsub>\<iota>\<^esub> e]"

proof (prove)
using this:
  AssignSideCondition x e \<iota>

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. WHATWHERE_Secure [x:=\<^bsub>\<iota>\<^esub> e]
by (metis WHATWHERE_Secure_Assign semAssignSC)
next
fix V \<iota>
assume IH: "unique_PPV V \<longrightarrow> WHATWHERE_Secure V"
assume uniPPspawn: "unique_PPc (spawn\<^bsub>\<iota>\<^esub> V)"
hence "unique_PPV V"

proof (prove)
using this:
  unique_PPc (spawn\<^bsub>\<iota>\<^esub> V)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. unique_PPV V
by (simp add: unique_PPV_def unique_PPc_def)
with IH

proof (chain)
picking this:
  unique_PPV V \<longrightarrow> WHATWHERE_Secure V
  unique_PPV V
have "WHATWHERE_Secure V"

proof (prove)
using this:
  unique_PPV V \<longrightarrow> WHATWHERE_Secure V
  unique_PPV V

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. WHATWHERE_Secure V
with uniPPspawn

proof (chain)
picking this:
  unique_PPc (spawn\<^bsub>\<iota>\<^esub> V)
  WHATWHERE_Secure V
show "WHATWHERE_Secure [spawn\<^bsub>\<iota>\<^esub> V]"

proof (prove)
using this:
  unique_PPc (spawn\<^bsub>\<iota>\<^esub> V)
  WHATWHERE_Secure V

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. WHATWHERE_Secure [spawn\<^bsub>\<iota>\<^esub> V]
by (metis Compositionality_Spawn)
next
fix c1 c2
assume IH1: "unique_PPc c1 \<Longrightarrow> WHATWHERE_Secure [c1]"
assume IH2: "unique_PPc c2 \<Longrightarrow> WHATWHERE_Secure [c2]"
assume uniPPc1c2: "unique_PPc (c1;c2)"
from uniPPc1c2

proof (chain)
picking this:
  unique_PPc (c1;c2)
have uniPPc1: "unique_PPc c1"

proof (prove)
using this:
  unique_PPc (c1;c2)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. unique_PPc c1
by (simp add: unique_PPc_def)
with IH1

proof (chain)
picking this:
  unique_PPc c1 \<Longrightarrow> WHATWHERE_Secure [c1]
  unique_PPc c1
have IS1: "WHATWHERE_Secure [c1]"

proof (prove)
using this:
  unique_PPc c1 \<Longrightarrow> WHATWHERE_Secure [c1]
  unique_PPc c1

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. WHATWHERE_Secure [c1]
from uniPPc1c2

proof (chain)
picking this:
  unique_PPc (c1;c2)
have uniPPc2: "unique_PPc c2"

proof (prove)
using this:
  unique_PPc (c1;c2)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. unique_PPc c2
by (simp add: unique_PPc_def)
with IH2

proof (chain)
picking this:
  unique_PPc c2 \<Longrightarrow> WHATWHERE_Secure [c2]
  unique_PPc c2
have IS2: "WHATWHERE_Secure [c2]"

proof (prove)
using this:
  unique_PPc c2 \<Longrightarrow> WHATWHERE_Secure [c2]
  unique_PPc c2

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. WHATWHERE_Secure [c2]
from IS1 IS2 uniPPc1c2

proof (chain)
picking this:
  WHATWHERE_Secure [c1]
  WHATWHERE_Secure [c2]
  unique_PPc (c1;c2)
show "WHATWHERE_Secure [c1;c2]"

proof (prove)
using this:
  WHATWHERE_Secure [c1]
  WHATWHERE_Secure [c2]
  unique_PPc (c1;c2)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. WHATWHERE_Secure [c1;c2]
by (metis Compositionality_Seq)
next
fix c b \<iota>
assume SC: "WhileSideCondition b"
assume IH: "unique_PPc c \<Longrightarrow> WHATWHERE_Secure [c]"
assume uniPPwhile: "unique_PPc (while\<^bsub>\<iota>\<^esub> b do c od)"
hence "unique_PPc c"

proof (prove)
using this:
  unique_PPc (while\<^bsub>\<iota>\<^esub> b do c od)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. unique_PPc c
by (simp add: unique_PPc_def)
with IH

proof (chain)
picking this:
  unique_PPc c \<Longrightarrow> WHATWHERE_Secure [c]
  unique_PPc c
have "WHATWHERE_Secure [c]"

proof (prove)
using this:
  unique_PPc c \<Longrightarrow> WHATWHERE_Secure [c]
  unique_PPc c

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. WHATWHERE_Secure [c]
with uniPPwhile SC

proof (chain)
picking this:
  unique_PPc (while\<^bsub>\<iota>\<^esub> b do c od)
  WhileSideCondition b
  WHATWHERE_Secure [c]
show "WHATWHERE_Secure [while\<^bsub>\<iota>\<^esub> b do c od]"

proof (prove)
using this:
  unique_PPc (while\<^bsub>\<iota>\<^esub> b do c od)
  WhileSideCondition b
  WHATWHERE_Secure [c]

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. WHATWHERE_Secure [while\<^bsub>\<iota>\<^esub> b do c od]
by (metis Compositionality_While semWhileSC)

proof (state)
this:
  WHATWHERE_Secure [while\<^bsub>\<iota>\<^esub> b do c od]

goal (2 subgoals):
 1. \<And>c1 c2 b \<iota>.
       \<lbrakk>\<turnstile>\<^bsub>\<C>\<^esub> c1;
        unique_PPc c1 \<Longrightarrow> WHATWHERE_Secure [c1];
        \<turnstile>\<^bsub>\<C>\<^esub> c2;
        unique_PPc c2 \<Longrightarrow> WHATWHERE_Secure [c2];
        IfSideCondition b c1 c2;
        unique_PPc (if\<^bsub>\<iota>\<^esub> b then c1 else c2 fi)\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> WHATWHERE_Secure
                          [if\<^bsub>\<iota>\<^esub> b then c1 else c2 fi]
 2. \<And>V.
       \<forall>i<length V.
          \<turnstile>\<^bsub>\<C>\<^esub> V ! i \<and>
          (unique_PPc (V ! i) \<longrightarrow>
           WHATWHERE_Secure [V ! i]) \<Longrightarrow>
       unique_PPV V \<longrightarrow> WHATWHERE_Secure V
next

proof (state)
goal (2 subgoals):

        \<turnstile>\<^bsub>\<C>\<^esub> c2;

theorem ComSecTyping_list_is_sound:
"\<lbrakk> \<turnstile>\<^bsub>\<V>\<^esub> V; unique_PPV V \<rbrakk> \<Longrightarrow> WHATWHERE_Secure V"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<lbrakk>\<turnstile>\<^bsub>\<V>\<^esub> V; unique_PPV V\<rbrakk>
    \<Longrightarrow> WHATWHERE_Secure V

by (metis ComSecTyping_single_is_sound parallel_cases 
  parallel_composition uniPPV_uniPPc)
end
end
